title: Create FO-03 directory structure and page files
description:
Create the FO-03 app directory with page and layout files.

Files to create:
- `app/fo-03/page.tsx` - Main page wrapper (copy from fo-02/page.tsx, update component name)
- `app/fo-03/layout.tsx` - Server layout (copy from fo-02/layout.tsx)
- `app/fo-03/fo-03-layout-client.tsx` - Client wrapper with nav (copy from fo-02)
- `app/fo-03/components/` - Create empty directory for components

Pattern: Copy FO-02 files and replace 'fo-02' with 'fo-03', 'FO02' with 'FO03' etc.
acceptance_criteria: ls app/fo-03/ shows page.tsx, layout.tsx, fo-03-layout-client.tsx; ls app/fo-03/components/ exists (may be empty)
closed_reason: Created FO-03 directory structure: page.tsx with placeholder content, layout.tsx server wrapper, fo-03-layout-client.tsx client nav wrapper, and components/.gitkeep. All files follow FO-02 patterns with updated naming.
